analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#554-555) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#554-555)

Reentrancy in TokenCappedCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#656-677):
	External calls:
	- super._processPurchase(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#661-662)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenPresaleSold (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#674-675)
	- tokenSold (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#667-668)

TokenCappedCrowdsale._preValidatePurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#635-646) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < saleStartTime (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#640-646)

TokenCappedCrowdsale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#656-677) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < saleStartTime (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#673-676)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/17/0x874d893b4777d821b5c342a03be422f14ca35110.sol#60) should be declared external
